description:
Here’s a clip conversation with Dr Pierre Kory on ‘The Disinformation Playbook’ and how it is used to crush independent voices. 

To watch the full interview click HERE: https://rumble.com/v4f0z9l-never-seen-death-rate-like-this-dr-pierre-kory-on-new-excess-death-data-sta.html

Find more of Dr Pierre Kory visit https://drpierrekory.com

Dr. Kory’s bestselling book, The War on Ivermectin: https://thehighwire.shop/collections/books/products/the-war-on-ivermectin-the-medicine-that-saved-millions-and-could-have-ended-the-pandemic

Watch MY Interview with Tucker Carlson exclusively on Locals here: https://bit.ly/TuckerCarlsonLocals

Support Me Directly HERE: https://rb.rumble.com

WATCH me LIVE weekdays on Rumble: https://bit.ly/russellbrand-rumble
title: This Goes Deeper Than You Know! | Dr Pierre Kory EXPOSES Disinformation Playbook
